A huge two-handed war hammer blessed by the church.

  • When you Gain Ground by breaking something, add +1. On a hit, take +1 momentum.
  • You may use your hammer to Repair objects that are cursed with Arcana. When you do so roll +spirit. While cleansing objects in this manner, you may sacrifice spirit instead of supply for extra repair points.
  • When you obliterate a living being cursed with Arcana using your hammer, take +1 spirit.
